documents.document: @JennyleeDixon @Womans_Way Ah thank you. It was great fun. (All credit to the Stylist, hair & makeup team and whoever airbrushed it!). Xxx
Got lots of compliments on my dress today on #RTEOne. It's from M&S @mandsireland @marksandspencer @carmelbreheny https://t.co/i5dss2mtIU
@CrossyTweets @gumpy77 Maybe you're right. He's obviously a part- time Actor. Ireland is tiny. We'll get to the root of this #roomtoimprove
I knew it! Never rob a bank when I'm there. Much to my regret sometimes, I NEVER forget a face (BTW I'm hopeless with names) #roomtoimprove
Jaypers....He's just popped up in the ads during the show! #AIG. I feel vindicated. I am not going mad! @CrossyTweets #roomtoimprove
@CrossyTweets I'm great with faces. Is Rob the actor in the #AIG Insurance ad? (He stands beside a car. A lady is in the ad too, not Julie)
Loving #RoomtoImprove @RTEOne. The couple, Rob & Julie- is he the guy in the ad for #AIG insurance? It's annoying me @COCOtv_ @AIGinsurance
The amazing @dontmindme41 mocked up this photo of me to mark #operationoats @FlahavansIRL @OpTranRTE @ciarakellydoc https://t.co/RxU7Nn7cbX
At least you have a chance of winning @CrossyTweets. I'm not even allowed play! Please remember me when you win. Xx https://t.co/v7KbB79tJm
Tomorrow, Sun at 4.55pm you've another chance to see @johncreedon learn how to & present a weather forecast #RTEOne https://t.co/mCJpCXWzHW
Whatever the weather, get moving! @FlahavansIRL porridge to start the day from @TescoIrl, @OpTranRTE #Goldilocks https://t.co/Q540vIq8Ks
Sincere thanks to Ashling @TescoIrl for sorting out an issue re: #OperationOats. @OpTranRTE #flahavansporridge #yourhealthisyourwealth
Thank you @TescoIrl for acknowledging my earlier tweet. I have sent you a DM. #OperationOats
Bring cash if you're collecting your free @FlahavansIRL in @TescoIrl #Merrion. Only free with purchase! @OpTranRTE https://t.co/iofcF49nQb
In the words of #BruceForsyth, 'Nice to see you, to see you nice!' @HoranBex #Evoke @EVOKE @dmgmedia_Irl #galpals https://t.co/b8TXsBglqD
You know looking up to the sky to check whether it's raining or not, can be a pain in the neck! #puns @Womans_Way https://t.co/e9CtfSRx2b
I'm looking forward to guesting on Evoke.ie tomorrow. I'm hoping to be a less fierce Editor than #MerylStreep in #thedevilwearsprada @EVOKE
Please give @LAVEESHA_ a well deserved vote. I'm a fan of her beautiful statement necklaces. I wear them on TV alot https://t.co/4f3GUvL17l
Very witty analysis & summary of tonight's #Eastenders on @MailOnline now. Jim Shelley's piece is spot-on. #soapopera #serialdrama
Great initiative! @OpTranRTE. I often add raisins & sprinkle nutmeg + cinnamon on my porridge. It 'livens' it up! https://t.co/QEwuRqy0Oj
Congrats to Ireland's €88milion #euromillions winner/s! For most of us, this is how we feel today @NationalLottery https://t.co/hs4pdI78Xn
A pleasure to meet you yesterday @Sarahdestafford. I 'forecast' a very 'bright' future for you! #workexperience https://t.co/Wmc1qsmWKE
Thanks @Womans_Way for making me your #covergirl this week after our chat about 'the weather'. @LCFinn @aineltoner https://t.co/ajjgOKydu4
Oh thanks @declanbuckley. #littlemisssunshine. @Womans_Way https://t.co/1k1Cy8x9RG
I wonder was John B's theory correct or just 'barking' mad?! Lol. @RTEArchives https://t.co/d0B2fBuEU3
A pleasure to meet you @Sarahdestafford. The future of Weather Presenting looks very bright for you. @WeatherRTE https://t.co/Wmc1qsmWKE
No winner of the #TellyBingo snowball today, @declanbuckley might give away the €50k, Tues #RTEOne @NationalLottery https://t.co/qoxPGT2bUJ
Can't wait to see the new @jackiefilm. Seeing it tmrw @imccinemas #Dunlaoghaire as a new First Lady takes the reins https://t.co/CfBmxe2g7R
Hail #dollyparton! I sang '9 to 5' as my first song back in 2007 on 'Charity You're a Star' @alzheimersocirl #Tbt https://t.co/VLCSftD247
Get your tickets asap. Today on #TellyBingo you're playing for a €40k #snowball. See the draw @RTEOne at 12.45pm https://t.co/2y7ZDSt5uj
There was no winner of the #TellyBingo #snowball today, so it's a €40k rollover, Thurs at 12.45pm @RTEOne. Good luck https://t.co/Fu2TueBPV8
Yes, that's correct. We often remind him that #BlessedArtThouAmongstWomen https://t.co/Y8fOyf9rOT
Unfortunate name for the hospital in #StrikingOut tonight.... 'St Judes' (the patron Saint of hopeless cases!).
Thanks @ocallaghanmaura for your very kind message. I'll pass it on. We're delighted you enjoyed your day @BTYSTE https://t.co/3Z6yNa8xj8
Is there no end to her talents?! Reporter, Dancer & now a Lollipop Lady. Lol. @Teresamannion @DWTSIRL #DWTSIrl https://t.co/iztFJ991Pm
I'm not surprised. I've been saying all week @denisemcactress is the one to watch. Great attitude & very focused. https://t.co/hGOahoRqsk
#DWTSIrl obviously isn't a superstitious show. @TeresaMannion opening an umbrella, indoors! #treacherous @DWTSIRL https://t.co/EdlR1yM1G0
Thanks for making @WeatherRTE so welcome again this year. It's always uplifting to meet such inspiring students. https://t.co/IrQuJJoCdK
Well done @katherinelyncho. Your dance got my Mom reminiscing on her waltzing days. #memorylane @DWTSIRL #DWTSIrl https://t.co/ELjzHbb1AM
As a teenager the first biography I read was that of #Jackie Kennedy. Can't wait to see the movie next week. #NataliePortman @jackiefilm
The person who won €10k on #TellyBingo today feels very lucky this #friday13th. Ticket sold @CentraIRL #Ballybrack https://t.co/WsiLRz9Ido
See you @BTYSTE tmrw. I'll be broadcasting live at 11am & 1.15pm. Best of luck to the students ahead of the awards. https://t.co/BVTQu2RvAA
No winner of the #TellyBingo #snowball today but a lucky player won €10k on the #fullhouse. Watch it back @RTEplayer https://t.co/XiGtKQT8zm
I made a shock announcement at work today....I've never been to any #Ikea shop! #roadTrip #flatpackhouse @IKEAIE https://t.co/nwhinJJ1z3
In honour of the #snow #showers that have been falling in places today. #ThrowbackThursday. Smile up Nuala! https://t.co/MrviknpNdu
Wishing it was #summer again when temperatures reached 20 degrees and above. #babyitscoldoutside #ThrowbackThursday https://t.co/lTtZlKoylq
I for one, sincerely hope it doesn't snow! I've the only job where 'it's snowing, I can't make it in' doesn't wash! https://t.co/l1AmhobjbC
Just limbering up before next Sunday's #DWTSIrl @DWTSIRL @Larbas @RTEOne #RTEOne. Great show tonight #imhooked https://t.co/uvlaazHKqh
I'll do the #Paso so. I could used the cape as an umbrella if the audience throw tomatoes at me! #DWTSIrl @DWTSIRL https://t.co/oSwpNG6CJQ
I read the article. V interesting. The characters's suit was stunning & great value @mandsireland @carmelbreheny https://t.co/TiBbbyoP2l
Have great fun @TeresaMannion. We 'forecast' you will go down a 'storm' (excuse the puns!). xxx https://t.co/cAQBMukHUC
This is available to watch on @rteplayer now. https://t.co/zRkLR7b8wn
I agree, George is such a lovely man. I also spot Sabrina ( makes the best lattes in the #Oasis) & Gerard #Postroom https://t.co/UTfZhgHplk
I'm remembering my former @aaroadwatch colleague #IanMcKeever today. Four years gone now. RIP. #GoneTooSoon https://t.co/62l8uRIkJI
@MikeParrActor I put them in porridge! #Oops #Sorry #Goldilocks
'Happiness' is hard to define and subjective, so I'll wish you all great health for #2017 #yourhealthisyourwealth https://t.co/bCuzyirefv
Congrats @NorahCasey. Great programme! I love seeing other people's houses. Terry's was v. impressive too. @Larbas https://t.co/Y1kkndzcOI
Enter @WeatherRTE photo comp via weathercomp@rte.ie; posting to RTEOne f/b; Instagram/Twitter using #rteweathercomp https://t.co/YPcqxOK9yS
@RSAIreland Thank you for your reply & offer of help. I had success on my laptop. All booked in now for January in #Deansgrange. #happy2017
I'm sure we are. Mariah Carey is probably a cousin too. I hope she gives us a lend of her shoe collection someday! https://t.co/KpUs5hcP8a
I can't believe you said that @ciarakellydoc. They are my absolute favs! Please send your leftovers to me. #Bounty https://t.co/WXR9EwJaok
More stories emerging about the kindness, humility & decency of #georgemichael. Thank you for sharing @annanolan70 https://t.co/iEB4GLrsar
'Annual Carey family get together' you say......where's my invitation? Lol. Have a great day. xxx https://t.co/dWci4CAGcP
Is it just me or is the ncts.ie website down? It's probably 'crashed' due to all the 'traffic' (excuse the puns!) Office closed. @RSAIreland
Just read on #Dailymail that the actress who played 'Nana' on #TheRoyleFamily has died. #RIP. #CarolineAherne will welcome you to Heaven. x
So you've another chance to see myself & @helcurran singing & dancing. #DWTSIrl better up their game! #letitsnow https://t.co/mFoG7PxGOg
Beautiful compilation. #RIPGeorge. https://t.co/iEF8PzHkaG
I've always loved his music. #RIPGeorge. Tomorrow night (Tuesday) at 10pm @BBCOne are showing his 2012 concert. https://t.co/lv4EDktVa2
Happy Christmas everyone! There is a yellow wind #warning in place today. Full update on details at 12.15pm, @RTEOne https://t.co/rxN0roDpPT
Behind the scenes photo of our star turn with #DanielODonnell. See it tonight @RTEOne at 9.30pm, #hohoho @helcurran https://t.co/AASSTMqyOT
It'll be a mild Christmas Day but becoming wet & windy. I'll have more on this & an update on #Santa @RTEOne 5.50pm https://t.co/XgVEOBMFkz
@Linden_Lad No I'm forecasting instead #RTEOne, 5.50pm. I feasted on some delicious chocolate today! Thank you very much. #happychristmas
A really lovely man who used to work in RTE shared today's birthday date with me. Sadly we lost him this year. We're thinking of you 'VC'. x
A magical birthday afternoon at #Powerscourt. Obligatory stop for festive food treats @avocaireland #SantasHelpers https://t.co/pbWe8JS0ht
Hands-down this is the most AMAZING card I have ever received. I love it! #happybirthdaytome #weatherforecast #sunny https://t.co/HVunyB5vZx
A magical birthday afternoon at #Powerscourt. Obligatory stop for festive food treats @avocaireland #SantasHelpers https://t.co/NTrs2ARkQc
Beautiful birthday spent @powerscourtHtl #Wicklow #powerscourtsantasleigh. #gardenofireland #walking #freshair https://t.co/ade61E8brj
Thank you for the few gifts I've opened. I love weather themed novelty pressies. #happybirthdaytome #muchappreciated https://t.co/yIVO4KUcEI
@KennedyLucy Congratulations on your baby girl! Make sure to put your feet up over Christmas & get Jessica on Santa's list asap! Nuala. xxx
So very sorry to hear about the #BerlinAttack. Here I am at that very Christmas Market last December. #PrayForBerlin https://t.co/DE50Chr8KI
When people say 'don't worry Nuala at your birthday dinner, there'll be no nasty surprises, like strippers! ' #disappointed
And I'll have all the details on this at 1pm on #RTEOne @RTEOne. #ohtheweatheroutside ISN'T frightful! https://t.co/VYDtunAP8g
I confess that #DTTBIRL is my #guiltypleasure @RTE2 & if tonight's couple ever want me to babysit their adorable daughter Emily, I'm there!
#ThrowbackThursday to that time I looked quite Angelic, aged 4. #butterwouldntmelt #voiceofanAngel #tbt #cherub https://t.co/xoSouE2pAf
I'm so proud of our Navy. This doc should be shown in all schools. It puts alot in perspective. @imsineadkennedy https://t.co/526oVXzZqf
Festive fun with @helcurran. Recording of an @RTEOne #Christmas show. #DreamingofawhiteChristmas #SecretSanta #snow https://t.co/WorTdXaPyI
@SoupyC1966 Hello Brian, I'm very sorry to hear about your Mum's passing. Sincere sympathies. I'm so glad she enjoyed me presenting Lotto. x
It's okay to play this game in LA @TheEllenShow because rain is a novelty. Not so well received in Ireland! Lol. x https://t.co/rhNd5vXqgr
I'm really looking forward to being MC at a local function later tonight & switching on some Christmas lights! https://t.co/tCAmrMY1FY
It'll be a cold, crisp day tomorrow; milder from Monday but more unsettled. I'll have all the details 5.50pm #RTEOne https://t.co/jJPeeHIkdt
What does any self-respecting Weather Presenter feast on during the #LateLateToyShow. #Snowballs ! @lidl_ireland https://t.co/DYxw4Y9fAo
I'd be great in panto! -'Oh no you wouldn't' #Frozen #TooOldToBeCinderella #SnowQueen #FairyGodmother #justsaying https://t.co/CE6a2r8kiH
Thanks @SigneSJohansen. I think the scenery of Scandinavia & Ireland are v similar. I visited Norway once-stunning! https://t.co/cv4gzvCJsI
When the local hairdressers knows you too well! #Hellomagazines & a #latte at the ready. I love @SakuraHairSalon https://t.co/YNCV8dlmHO
It's such an awful tragedy Banni couldn't have stayed with @ColmFlynn1 & his family in Ireland. #VerySad @RTE2 #realitybites #findingbanni
So no winner of #Lotto tonight.....it'll be an €11million rollover weekend. Good luck! @NationalLottery @RTEplayer https://t.co/2cnd7dSHOk
Flicking through this book #HowToHygge and found this quote, I believe the same! #sunlight #vitaminD #FreshAir https://t.co/7DuOKPHhJi
Best of luck everyone. Join me for the live draws tonight on #RTEOne at 7.55pm. #TimeToPlay #ItCouldBeYou #GoodLuck https://t.co/UEmInnIhHK
Can you imagine?! Congrats to John Moore on this 6-word challenge @Independent_ie #Lotto over €10.5mil #TimetoPlay https://t.co/7s9Bnh7jto
I think this photo was taken in my beloved #PhoenixPark. I always run my best here @phoenixparkopw @phoenixparkpics https://t.co/3vk80mDSX2
